titleStmt.title: 30/4/61. ¶ Dear Sir ¶ ¶ Allow me to remind you, that the Gentlemen of the Municipality kindly promised some treeguards for planting, Weeping Willows at the Yarra. ¶ yours very truly ¶ ¶ Ferd Mueller...

head.supplied: 30/4/61. ¶ Dear Sir ¶ ¶ Allow me to remind you, that the Gentlemen of the Municipality kindly promised some treeguards for planting, Weeping Willows at the Yarra. ¶ yours very truly ¶ ¶ Ferd Mueller...

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end; color: #0000ff;

div.p: The back reference to the approval of the tree guards is better to the original approval—and it better shows how long they kept him waiting?
Unit 731, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

See also M to E. FitzGibbon, 12 April 1861. 24 October 1860 and 5 November 1860, in this edition as 60-11-05e.
30/4/61.
Allow me to remind you, that the Gentlemen of the Municipality kindly promised some treeguards for planting, Weeping Willows at the Yarra.
